samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control visualizes the continents in the world by rendering those in a map layer.

samples.name: Projection
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control shows the details of permanent and non-permanent countries in the UN Security Council, in 2017.

samples.name: Multi-layers
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control depicts the layer along with sublayers for California and Texas.

samples.name: Marker
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control shows the top 25 populated cities in the world by displaying the markers in their locations.

samples.name: Marker template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control indicates the temperature of various cities of Australia in marker templates.

samples.name: Labels
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control shows the names of all the states in USA in data label. Intersect action and smart labels mode can be changed.

samples.name: Bubble
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control illustrates the top 30 countries which has highest Internet users in bubbles of the year 2016.

samples.name: Navigation Lines
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control illustrates the sea routes between various cities for shipping.

samples.name: Legend
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control visualizes grouping of countries in the legend based on its population density.

samples.name: Annotations
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control depicts the facts about Africa continent and a direction compass in an annotation.

samples.name: Tooltip
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control depicts the countries that were appeared in the finals of Cricket World Cup and their counts.

samples.name: Selection & Highlight
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control visualizes USA president election results in the year 2016. Default and interactive are the two types of legend.

samples.name: Zooming & Panning
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control depicts the properties required to zoom and pan the rendered map.

samples.name: Drill Down
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control demonstrates drill down with all the continents in the initial view and countries on drill.

samples.name: Print
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control illustrates the printing functionality in the maps control.

samples.name: Export
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control illustrates the exporting functionality in the maps control.

samples.name: Heat Map
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control visualizes the state wise population of India in the year 2011. Color for states will be applied based on its value.

samples.name: Flight routes
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control demonstrates the flight routes from India to China using navigation lines feature.

samples.name: Earthquake indication
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control demonstrates the earth quack occurred in Sumatra, Indonesia in the year 2009.

samples.name: Highlighted region
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control depicts the ATM populated areas in Oklahoma by highlighting the regions.

samples.name: Map with Pie chart
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control visualizes the placing of pie charts on the maps using marker templates.

samples.name: Bus seat booking
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Maps control demonstrates the rendering of normal geometry type shapes on the map.
